import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useEffect, useRef, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { useAppContext } from "../../context/appContext"; const Header = () => { const { cart } = useSelector((state) => state.cart); const { toCart } = useAppContext(); const [cartItem, setCartItem] = useState(); const x = useRef(true); console.log(cartItem); useEffect(() => { (async () => { if (x.current) { x.current = false; const res = await axios.get("/cart"); console.log(res.data); setCartItem(cartItem, res.data); toCart(res.data); } })(); }); return ( <>
